Title: Relates to providing electronic toll collection devises for milk dealers free of charge
Summary: Provides milk dealers who operate trucks throughout the state buying, delivering, and selling milk with an EZ pass free of charge, where the authority will be responsible for the cost so long as it can be proved the truck is used exclusively for such purpose.
LawCode: Add ยง378-b, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to providing milk dealers with electronic toll collection devices free of charge
